hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: If I were in front of the Prophet (ﷺ), I would see his armpits. Ibn Mu'adh added that Lahiq said: Do you not see, AbuHurayrah could not stand in front of the Prophet (ﷺ) while he was praying. Musa added: When he uttered the takbir, he raised his hands

chapter.eng-name: Those Who Mentioned That He Should Raise His Hands After Standing Up After Two Rak'ah
